name: Three Laws
description:
Three Sherrifs killed your family and stole your money.

It's up to you to track them down while surviving the harsh deserts and bunny infested forests.

Only you can bring justice to the three laws!

- Procedurally generated world

- Red light green light combat system

- Hunger and Thirst mechanics

- No winning state, play forever!

- Silent ambiance for those who dislike loud noises
